properties.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 29 at 2:47PM AKST until March 1 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Wind chills to 40 below occuring. Low visibility in
blowing snow is expected late tonight through Sunday morning.
The cold wind chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10
minutes to exposed skin. Visibility is expected to be one half
mile or less at times.

* WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills.

* WHEN....Cold wind chills will moderate late tonight. Blowing
snow with low visibility will develop tonight and continue
through Sunday morning. Conditions will improve Sunday
afternoon.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold wind chills are now occuring at
Shaktoolik, but other areas are less extreme. South winds
increasing to 40 mph tonight will cause areas of low visibility
in blowing snow.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
